long_description: With retro style and modern optics, the Spy Trevor snow goggles deliver a comfortable blend of features and value for your days on the mountain. Grey lens has 25.2% visible light transmission (VLT) and a black mirror finish to cut glare and offer excellent definition in bright, sunny light. Cylindrical lens is designed to deliver wide peripheral vision. Double-layer thermal lens creates a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and the warm air next to your face, helping reduce fogging. Antifog and antiscratch lens treatments help keep your vision clear and distortion-free. Flexible polyurethane frame ensures a comfortable fit. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Spy Trevor snow goggles have an adjustable strap backed with silicone ribbing so it stays in place, whether you're wearing a helmet or not.
short_description: With retro style and modern optics, the Spy Trevor snow goggles deliver a comfortable blend of features and value for your days on the mountain.
